title: I Possessed the Final Villain of the Horror Game - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Ghosts   Reincarnated in a Game World   Survival   Transported into a Game World   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Elliella   엘리엘라
description:
I entered a horror game. Not even as the main character, but as the final boss!

The narrative states that she will die from fear after seeing a ghost with a terrible appearance. But then again, if she doesn’t do the rituals written here every time the Crimson Moon rises, she will die a horrendous death.

“Why are you trying to run away? You went to bed in my arms before…”

“Use me to your heart’s content and command me. I was born to be your sl*ve.”

“That’s why you should have protected yourself a little more so I wouldn’t be interested in you.”

It’s already hard enough to survive, but why are the characters that were supposed to be supporting roles approaching me?!

I don’t think these guys are normal either…>
